=====================
pydataportability.xrd
=====================

:mod:`pydataportability.xrd` is a component which is able to parse
:term:`XRD` documents. The result will be an instance of `
:mod:`pydataportability.model.resource.model.Resource`.

:mod:`pydataportability.xrd` is developed as part of the ``pydataportability``
library which consists of various tools for implementing application in
the context of the "open web". For more information check out
http://pydataportability.net

:mod:`pydataportability.xrd` is released under the BSD license and mainly
developed by `COM.lounge GmbH <http://comlounge.net>`_.

.. warning:: This is work in progress and the API is going to change! Also note 
    that the XRD specification is work in progress, too.
